The group has expanded organically and externally, with a revenue growing from ‚Ç¨458 million in 2014 to ‚Ç¨1.5 billion in 2022, with 2,200 employees and 55 nationalities.

With close to 1,900 listed issuers and around ‚Ç¨6.5 trillion in market capitalisation as of end June 2023, it has an unmatched blue-chip franchise and a strong diverse domestic and international client base, as well as a large Tech companies community, Euronext Tech Leaders. Euronext closely accompanies corporates thanks to its pre-IPO programmes and a full suite of innovative corporate services. Euronext operates regulated and transparent equity and derivatives markets, one of Europe's leading electronic fixed income trading markets and is the largest center for debt and funds listings in the world. Its total product offering includes Equities, FX, Exchange Traded Funds, Warrants & Certificates, Bonds, Power, Derivatives, Commodities, Advanced Data Services and Indices.

The Group provides a European multi-asset clearing house through Euronext Clearing, and custody and settlement services through Euronext Securities central securities depositories in Denmark, Italy, Norway and Portugal. Euronext also leverages its expertise in running markets by providing technology, corporate and data services to third parties.

Euronext is engaged in an ambitious ESG policy, translated into its "Fit for 1.5¬∞" commitment to net zero, supported by SBTI approved targets.

Euronext Corporate Services

Euronext Corporate Services, is at the core of Euronext's Growth for Impact 2024 strategy. It has delivered ‚Ç¨46m of revenue in 2023, growing +12% vs 2022, being one of the most important growth engine of the Group.

Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain).

The team is composed of over 170 professionals across Europe. They help listed companies make the most effective use of capital markets, and support private and public organisations run more efficiently.

Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain).

This unique and comprehensive value proposition is articulated around three main pillars:

* Governance services: To public and private organizations we provide our board portal solution "iBabs" to help secure, organize and run board meetings more efficiently (save time preparing agendas and board packs, collaborate easily with annotations, voting, meeting summaries).Our advanced video technology allows you to easily broadcast your meetings, from webinars, townhalls and studio events, we provide the right solution

* Investor relations and communication services: we help our clients to increase their visibility, engagement and international coverage with shareholders, investors and all stakeholders with leading digital communications and streaming solutions. We also provide flexible and customized market data components for Investor Relations websites of listed companies. Our IR.Manager tool provides a complete and intuitive IR management and targeting platform for corporate IR teams to professionalize the workflow and engagement. Our advisory team provides high-touch advisory, ESG advisory, market intelligence and decision making analytics for listed companies willing to be more active on capital markets.

* Compliance services : our ComplyLog products helps companies simplify their EU regulatory duties, speed up workflows and ensure compliance by automating the management of inside information and insider lists for both issuers and their professional advisors ensuring compliance with the European Market Abuse Regulation (MAR).

Euronext Corporate Services is a fully integrated division of Euronext, including all the resources to pursue its business activities: Revenue, Growth Marketing, Product, Technology & Operations, Client Services and Transformation. It also relies on Euronext support functions to accompany its growth.

Role and Key Accountabilities

As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for analyzing complex datasets to provide actionable insights, developing predictive models, and contributing to the overall data strategy. The accountability includes:

  • Lead and manage data science projects from concept to deployment.
  • Be hands-on to build and maintain the data platform from the pipeline itself to the documentation, dictionary, and critical support processes.
  • Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide array of challenging problems using different analytical and statistical approaches.
  • Develop, test, and implement advanced machine learning models and algorithms.
  • Own the process of gathering, extracting, and compiling data across sources via relevant tools (e.g., SQL, R, Python). Independently format, re-structure, and/or validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset to ensure it is ready for analysis.
  • Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis, experimentation, data mining, and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our products .
  • Mentor other data engineers, drive excellency and software craftsmanship within the team and across the organization
  • Establish a data-driven culture by driving the definition, tracking, and operationalizing of metrics.
  • Develop data visualizations and socialize dashboards, reports, and other ways of enabling the team and company to answer product data questions in a self-serve way.
  • Partner with other data scientists across the company to share knowledge and continually synthesizing learnings across the organization.
  • Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.

Knowledge, Personality, Skills and Experience Required

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Minimum 5+ years of experience in data science, dba role or related field.
  • Excellent understanding of relational databases and NoSQL databases, performance tuning and database optimization.
  • Expertise in data integration techniques, including ETL processes, data pipelines, and data synchronization.
  • Strong expertise in machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
  • Proven hands-on programming skills in Python, R, or similar languages.
  • Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or matplotlib.
  • Experience with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Excellent understanding of Column-Store RDBMS (DataBricks, Snowflake, Redshift, Vertica, Clickhouse).
  • Extensive knowledge of data governance principles, data quality management, and data privacy regulations.
  • Demonstrated ability to handle large datasets and perform data wrangling.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen analytical mindset.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at various levels, Fluency in English.

Euronext Values

Unity

  • We respect and value the people we work with
  • We are unified through a common purpose
  • We embrace diversity and strive for inclusion

Integrity

  • We value transparency, communicate honestly and share information openly
  • We act with integrity in everything we do
  • We don't hide our mistakes, and we learn from them

Agility

  • We act with a sense of urgency and decisiveness
  • We are adaptable, responsive and embrace change
  • We take smart risks

Energy

  • We are positively driven to make a difference and challenge the status quo
  • We focus on and encourage personal leadership
  • We motivate each other with our ambition

Accountability

  • We deliver maximum value to our customers and stakeholders
  • We take ownership and are accountable for the outcome
  • We reward and celebrate performance

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. We value the unique talents of all our people, who come from diverse backgrounds with different personal experiences and points of view and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect.

We value the unique talents of all our people, who come from diverse backgrounds with different personal experiences and points of view and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect.

Title: Deep Learning Engineer - Relocation to Poland, Portugal, or Spain
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products ‚Äî including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more ‚Äî help our 45+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‚Äå 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work‚Ñ¢. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

As we continue to rapidly expand our customer base across the world, our team‚Äôs commercial impact also grows. Every step the team automates is one less step that needs to be handled manually, enabling Revolut to scale globally.

We‚Äôre looking for Deep Learning Engineers in different departments, from Computer Vision and NLP to Quant, to help us better automate compliance-related processes by developing and producing both online and offline algorithms. Motivated individuals skilled in software engineering, machine learning, neural networks, and applied mathematics, who possess a passion for building solutions, and have a high aptitude for data technologies and advanced models.

This role offers the opportunity to relocate to Poland, Portugal, or Spain, where you‚Äôll receive support from Revolut throughout the entire process. Once you move, you‚Äôll have the flexibility to work remotely or in a hybrid model in our offices in Barcelona, Madrid, Porto, or Krak√≥w.

Up for the challenge? Let‚Äôs get in touch üöÄ

What You‚Äôll Be Doing


Working on customer-focused features
Delivering real impact to features through rigorous data-driven solutions
Improving existing algorithms and building new Proofs of Concept
Researching and delivering PoCs into data products
Collaborating with Product Owners, Engineers, and Data Scientists to continually solve complex data problems


What You'll Need


5+ years of production experience
A bachelor‚Äôs degree in a STEM subject (mathematics, computer science, engineering)
Knowledge of Python with experience in computational libraries, OOP, TDD, and multi-processing
Knowledge of SQL (joins, CTEs, functions, etc.)
Hands-on experience with DL libs (PyTorch/TensorFlow/Keras, ONNX/OpenVino)
A solid understanding of probability and statistics fundamentals
To have a big picture approach to correctly diagnose problems and productionise research
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to partner with Product Owners and department heads


Nice to have


A master‚Äôs degree or PhD in a quantitative discipline
Experience with additional programming languages, such as Java, Scala, or C++
Experience in anti-fraud departments
Experience at a large tech company
School/university Olympic medal competitions in physics, maths, economics, or programming


Building a global financial super app isn‚Äôt enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that‚Äôs why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We‚Äôre doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That‚Äôs why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.

Title: Associate Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Company: 7.1 Tech Hub - a ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE company
Description:
Introduction Sentence

As an Associate Data Scientist in our Tech Hub in Portugal, you will be at the forefront of innovation at our company and engage with stakeholders across various business units to integrate artificial intelligence as a pivotal support tool across our entire value chain, spanning from content processing to monetization. In this position, you will take on an important role within your Scrum team focusing on the development, adjustment, and monitoring of Machine Learning Models, as well as on the exploration of new developments in research and the market.

Sounds like an exciting and varied setup? Then become part of our team and drive cutting-edge solutions for the ProSiebenSat.1 Group.

What You Can Expect In This Role


As an Associate Data Scientist, you will work as part of a project team on the development of new machine learning applications for our internal colleagues
You will take responsibility and contribute your own ideas to ensure our applications use the best possible models, driving topics from feature engineering and algorithm selection to model monitoring/evaluation
You will work on our state-of-the-art AI / ML cloud platform with over 300GB of data processed daily and with frameworks like MetaFlow and MLflow on topics ranging from classical machine learning in big data environments to NLP and video mining
You will have the chance to perform advanced data analysis with SQL and Apache Spark on distributed systems and use the gained insights to enable data driven decision making
Teamwork and your development are always at the top of our agenda - you will work closely with our experienced team and receive the coaching you need to develop further


Your Essential Experience And Education


You have a university degree in data science, mathematics, statistics or in a comparable field with (very) good grades
You have already gained practical experience in data science and machine learning, NLP and/or Computer Vision would be a plus
Your Python skills are outstanding, as well as your theoretical and practical knowledge of statistical methods and machine learning algorithms
Ideally, you have experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure or GCP) and ML-Ops tools such as MetaFlow and MLflow
Enjoy working in an agile team setup while showcasing an exceptional willingness to learn
Fluent in English (Portuguese and/ or German language proficiency is a plus)


What's in it for you?


Become a part of a leading media company and help us to create real emotions among our viewers and customers
Join us in our transformation journey as we work to create a world-class technology hub
Benefit from 25 days of vacation per year, a great flexibility and the possibility of mobile working thanks to our hybrid working model
Enjoy an open and diverse company culture with flat hierarchies, as well as a modern and appreciative working environment and no formal dress code
Take advantage of our wide range of training and development opportunities
Join our P7S1 employee networks and get engaged in a topic you are passionate about, e.g., PROUD, Greenteam, fempowerment, language buddies
More perks to come soon (e.g. professional development opportunities, fitness classes)


Closure

We are looking forward to your application!

Apply within 5 minutes via our job portal.

Your profile doesn't fit 100%? No worries, apply anyway! We support your professional & personal development on the job.

At Seven.One Tech Hub, part of ProSiebenSat.1 as the home of popular entertainment/infotainment and a leading entertainment and commerce player in the German-speaking region, we make digital entertainment happen! Reaching millions of viewers and users each day is the basis of our success. We develop first-class products and take our technology to the next level every single day. You are looking for an exciting career opportunity in media and e-com, love to work for different branches and products, and become part of a diverse tech community? Join our newly set-up Tech Hub and become a crucial part of our digital future.

Company Text

Click here to learn more about the ProSiebenSat.1 Group and our diverse portfolio.

As a signatory of the Diversity Charter, ProSiebenSat.1 is committed to a working environment free of prejudice and actively promotes diversity and equal opportunities among employees.

You have a disability and would like to apply? Then you are very welcome.

We know that we are not entirely accessible yet, but we are working on it. Let's talk about how we can eliminate any barrier together and find an individual solution if needed.

Although we refer to one gender in the text, all genders may be implied.

Title: Software Engineer (Python)
Description:
Fibersail

We are on a mission to empower the green energy market. We aim to contribute to a more sustainable world by offering solutions that propel wind energy to the next level of evolution.

What We Do

We develop wind solutions that optimize the design and operation of wind power systems. Our technology can help prevent failures and optimize wind turbine operations, contributing to increased wind turbine longevity and asset valuation.

Job Summary

We are looking for an experienced Backend Software Engineer that will join our team to deliver cutting edge software. You will help us build scalable, efficient software while shaping the architecture landscape.

Responsibilities


Autonomous working while being a collaborative contributor
Developing cutting edge quality software deployable in the cloud and in the edge
Following industry best practices in code development, testing and documentation
Agile and goal oriented



Qualifications


Programing experience in Python, C or Rust
Experience with data processing and analytics
Experience with Cloud and edge infrastructure
Hands on experience with structured and unstructured data, ideal candidate will show expertise with time series
Knowledge of test driven development
Curious about new tech and avid learner
High proficiency level in English
Valid EU work permit
Strong analytical skills
Good communication skills
Ability to work in an international, dynamic, and fast-growing business
Proactive and responsible
Take ownership of deliverables



What We Offer


Health Insurance
Flex-time & hybrid workplace
A dynamic work environment in a fast-growing company
Meal & benefit allowances (to use on meals, public transport, PPR, IT equipment, health, etc.)
Office perks (healthy snacks, fresh fruits, small snacks, coffee, tea, etc.)
Competitive salary package that values your work and matches your experience and expertise
Opportunity to make a real impact in the world shaping the Wind Energy Industry



We are only considering candidates with a valid EU work permit for this position. Thank you!

Title: Senior Data Scientist
HTML:
Sword Health is on a mission to free two billion people from pain as the world‚Äôs first and only end-to-end platform to predict, prevent and treat pain. Delivering a 62% reduction in pain and a 60% reduction in surgery intent, at Sword, we are using technology to save millions for our 2,500+ enterprise clients across three continents. Today, we hold the majority of industry patents, win 70% of competitive evaluations, and have raised more than $300 million from top venture firms like Founders Fund, General Catalyst, and Khosla Ventures. Recognized as a Forbes Best Startup Employer in 2023, this award highlights our focus on being a destination for the best and brightest talent. Not only have we experienced unprecedented growth since our market debut in 2020, but we‚Äôve also created a remarkable mission and value-driven environment that is loved by our growing team. With a recent valuation of $2 billion, we are in a phase of hyper growth and expansion, and we‚Äôre looking for individuals with passion, commitment, and energy to help us scale our impact. Joining Sword Health means committing to a set of core values, chief amongst them to ‚Äúdo it for the patients‚Äù every day, and to always ‚Äúdeliver more than expected‚Äù on behalf of our members and clients. This is an opportunity for you to make a significant difference on a massive scale as you work alongside 800+ (and growing!) talented colleagues, spanning two continents. Your charge? To help us build a pain-free world, powered by technology, enhanced by people ‚Äî accessible to all. Sword Health is looking for a Data Scientist to enable AI/ML projects to power the Sword health platform from end-to-end. You will work together on multiple vertical projects such as Product, Marketing, Finance and Clinical Outcomes to design, prototype and test novel clinical and digital models. Additionally, you will dig deep in data statistical analysis that will help both business and patient care. You will be working inside our Data Team at Sword that is helping our business to become more and more Data centric and you will have a tremendous impact on millions of lives. What you'll be doing:

  • Lead data science projects from design, exploration, prototype and test novel clinical and digital interventions to understand member musculoskeletal health needs and behavioral tendencies
  • Leverage advanced programming and processing of large datasets towards those ends
  • Work alongside with data engineers, dana analysts, data scientists and product managers to deploy designed and well-tested ML models into practice, helping design appropriate frameworks to test and monitor ongoing model performance
  • Provide methodological, statistical, design and analytical guidance for new and ongoing operations and applied research projects
  • Work and collaborate with internal stakeholders (Finance, Marketing, Clinical operations, Growth) to develop strategies and data science products to solve real world problems
  • Partner with business groups in the company to identify opportunities to deploy bespoke models and create additional models to answer key questions about member behavior


What you need to have:

  • 4+ years of experience in Data Science roles
  • Previous Experience using descriptive and inferential statistics in the context of a product
  • Previous Experience using machine learning to derive insights and find patterns in the data
  • Working knowledge of SQL as well as statistical packages (such as those in R or Python)
  • Experience on leading complex and ambiguous initiatives with full autonomy
  • Excellent communication skills and able to communicate their findings with different stakeholders, including those who are non-technical from other teams
  • Experience on solving complex business problems with data, being able to use complex tools and techniques and expected to work independently and take ownership of projects
  • Expected to have project management skills, including the ability to plan, prioritize and lead multiple large-scale projects with cross-functional teams


What we would love to see:

  • Experience with irregular time-series/event data
  • Experience in working with cloud platforms
  • Genuine curiosity that drives you to experiment and try new things


To ensure you feel good solving a big Human problem, we offer:

  • A stimulating, fast-paced environment with lots of room for creativity
  • A bright future at a promising high-tech startup company
  • Career development and growth, with a competitive salary
  • The opportunity to work with a talented team and to add real value to an innovative solution with the potential to change the future of healthcare
  • A flexible environment where you can control your hours (remotely) with unlimited vacation
  • Access to our health and well-being program (digital therapist sessions)
  • Remote or Hybrid work policy


*Please note that this position does not offer relocation assistance. Candidates must possess a valid EU visa and be based in Portugal. US - Sword Benefits & Perks:

  • Comprehensive health, dental and vision insurance*;
  • Equity shares*;
  • Discretionary PTO plan*;
  • Parental leave*;
  • 401(k);
  • Flexible working hours;
  • Remote-first company;
  • Paid company holidays;
  • Free digital therapist for you and your family. *Eligibility: Full-time employees regularly working 25+ hours per week Portugal - Sword Benefits & Perks:
  • Health, dental and vision insurance;
  • Meal allowance;
  • Equity shares;
  • Remote work allowance;
  • Flexible working hours;
  • Work from home;
  • Unlimited vacation;
  • Snacks and beverages;
  • English class;
  • Unlimited access to Coursera Learning Platform. *US Applicants Only: Applicants must have a legal right to work in the United States, and immigration or work visa sponsorship will not be provided.* SWORD Health, which includes SWORD Health, Inc. and Sword Health Professionals (consisting of Sword Health Care Providers, P.A., SWORD Health Care Providers of NJ, P.C., SWORD Health Care Physical Therapy Providers of CA, P.C.*) complies with applicable Federal and State civil rights laws and does not discriminate on the basis of Age, Ancestry, Color, Citizenship, Gender, Gender expression, Gender identity, Gender information, Marital status, Medical condition, National origin, Physical or mental disability, Pregnancy, Race, Religion, Caste, Sexual orientation, and Veteran status

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




Decskill Talent: We believe that our people are key to our success.

Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.




Decskill Boost: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.




Decskill Connect: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a Python Developer for a project based in Porto.




Requirements:

At least 3 years of experience developing with Python;
Testing background;
Networking protocols background;
English speaker.




If you‚Äôre interested in this job please send your CV in English to carolina.novais@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúCS/Python‚Äù.




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (m/f)
HTML:
Dellent is a consulting company focused in System Information and Telecommunications. Our goal is to help our candidates and consultants to take a step forward in their careers through projects that meet their needs and expectations.

In this project you‚Äôll contact with the European stock market area and will be able to work for a leading global trading platform that knows the importance of surveillance issues. Despite its development center being located in Porto and all administrative support in Lisbon, you will be part of a multicultural team that is spread across several European cities.

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to work in a project in Porto (hybrid model)

Requirements

  • Bachelor's or advanced degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or a related field;
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning;
  • In-depth knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and generative AI techniques;
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch;
  • Strong understanding of NLP techniques and frameworks such as BERT, GPT, or Transformer models;
  • Experience with cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS;
  • Knowledge in data engineering, including data curation, cleaning, and preprocessing;
  • Strong collaboration with software engineering and operations teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI models;
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions;
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at various levels;
  • Track record of driving innovation and staying updated with the latest AI research and advancements;
  • Proven experience in leading AI teams, with a track record of successful project delivery and team management;
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate team members and collaborate effectively with cross-functional stakeholders;
  • Strategic thinker with a results-oriented mindset and a passion for driving business impact through technological innovation.

We offer

  • Integration in a dynamic, experienced and friendly team;
  • Technical, behavioral and linguistics training opportunities;
  • Career development.

If this project fits your career expectations, submit your application through our website here. You can also explore our content about the job market here.

Title: AI Software Engineer
Description:
üì¢ Our mission? Ivy Partners is a Swiss consulting firm contributing to the evolution of businesses in their strategic, technological, and organizational challenges.




Our goal today is to offer our collaborators a career that will contribute positively to their fulfillment and well-being, by enhancing their skills and offering them real prospects for evolution.







üë©‚Äçüíªüßë‚Äçüíª As an AI Software Engineer at Ivy Partners, your missions will be:




Advise and guide the team in designing modern and modular software architectures and frameworks for AI-powered and mostly web-based applications.
Take the lead on establishing best practices for software engineering and adopting the most suitable frameworks, tools and platforms for building successful AI applications.
Develop AI-powered software applications, which might include multiple components such as frontend, backend, databases, API integrations and monitoring.
Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists and software engineers to ensure seamless integration of data pipelines, machine learning algorithms and software modules into successful AI-based applications.




üèÖ About you!




Data Engineering: Advanced proficiency in data preparation, processing, and analysis.
Machine Learning: Confirmed experience in developing and deploying machine learning models.
Artificial Intelligence: Strong expertise in AI methodologies and technologies.
Software Architecture & Frameworks: Proven experience in designing scalable software architectures and working with relevant frameworks.
Financial Knowledge: Basic understanding of financial concepts such as derivatives, stocks, trading, and equities.
Education: A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field is preferred.
Experience: A minimum of 1 year of experience in AI, machine learning, or related roles.







ü§ù IVY, it‚Äôs also:




Kindness | Concerned about our employees, we guarantee a favourable environment where everyone is valued and offered training and prospects for evolution in Switzerland or internationally.




Trust | Working with us means developing a partnership based on trust, professionalism, and transparency at every moment.




Innovation | We guarantee an effective digital transformation thanks to technological innovation coupled with creativity.




Responsibility | The collective is at the base of everything we undertake, and we take this responsibility seriously by striving to have a positive impact.

Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!

Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days‚Ä¶ all remote!


Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the ‚ÄúIndex of Excellence‚Äù, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Us

DIGESTAID is dedicated to advancing digestive healthcare through cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence solutions. Our interdisciplinary team comprises gastroenterologists, researchers, and engineers, all driven to revolutionize diagnostics and treatments in gastroenterology. We aim to enhance the accuracy and effectiveness of diagnostic tools and therapeutic methods, of diagnostic tools and therapeutic methods, including anoscopy, cholangioscopy, capsule endoscopy and even going beyond and entering fields of gynecology, such as colposcopy.

Having recently secured seed funding, we are on the lookout for top talent passionate about AI for good. Join us and be part of a mission-driven team focused on making a significant impact in the field of gastrointestinal software.

About The Role

As the first Data Scientist specializing in computer vision for gynecology at DIGESTAID, you will develop and refine AI models that advance our product offerings. Collaborating closely with our Head of AI and the R&D team, your primary focus will be on creating, optimizing, and evaluating machine learning models tailored to improve diagnostic accuracy and therapeutic outcomes in female reproductive health.

This is an excellent opportunity for an experienced Data Scientist who is passionate about delivering practical AI solutions and enjoys taking on challenges in computer vision.

Key Responsibilities


Develop, optimize, and evaluate machine learning models to enhance the performance of our gynecology products.
Collaborate with the R&D team to translate clinical needs into AI solutions.
Conduct research and experiments to improve our AI solutions in medical imaging and diagnostics aid.
Implement and maintain software in a production environment.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in computer vision, deep learning, and gynecological healthcare.


Requirements


MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, Biomedical Engineering, or equivalent work experience.
Proven experience in computer vision and deep learning, particularly in image classification and object detection.
Strong programming skills in Python and proficiency in bash scripting.
Solid understanding of data structures and software engineering practices.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies.
Excellent English communication skills.


Desirable Qualifications


PhD with a focus on Computer Vision or Machine Learning.
Experience with medical imaging, particularly in the field of gynecology.
Proficiency in software engineering best practices, including unit testing and logging.
Familiarity with Google Cloud environments and products.
Hands-on experience with PyTorch, TensorFlow, GitHub Actions, and Google Vertex AI.
Knowledge of MLOps practices.
Strong skills in data visualization and the ability to present complex data insights effectively.

Title: AI Developer
Description:
Euronext

Euronext is the leading pan-European market infrastructure, shaping capital markets for future generations. Its mission is to connect European economies to global capital markets, to accelerate innovation and sustainable growth. Euronext is located in 18 countries across Europe, US and Asia, with regulated exchanges in Belgium, France, Ireland, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway and Portugal. The group has expanded organically and externally, with a revenue growing from ‚Ç¨458 million in 2014 to ‚Ç¨1.5 billion in 2022, with 2,200 employees and 55 nationalities.

With close to 1,900 listed issuers and around ‚Ç¨6.5 trillion in market capitalisation as of end June 2023, it has an unmatched blue-chip franchise and a strong diverse domestic and international client base, as well as a large Tech companies community, Euronext Tech Leaders. Euronext closely accompanies corporates thanks to its pre-IPO programmes and a full suite of innovative corporate services. Euronext operates regulated and transparent equity and derivatives markets, one of Europe's leading electronic fixed income trading markets and is the largest center for debt and funds listings in the world. Its total product offering includes Equities, FX, Exchange Traded Funds, Warrants & Certificates, Bonds, Power, Derivatives, Commodities, Advanced Data Services and Indices.

The Group provides a European multi-asset clearing house through Euronext Clearing, and custody and settlement services through Euronext Securities central securities depositories in Denmark, Italy, Norway and Portugal. Euronext also leverages its expertise in running markets by providing technology, corporate and data services to third parties.

Euronext is engaged in an ambitious ESG policy, translated into its "Fit for 1.5¬∞" commitment to net zero, supported by SBTI approved targets.

Euronext Corporate Services

Euronext Corporate Services, is at the core of Euronext's Growth for Impact 2024 strategy. It has delivered ‚Ç¨46m of revenue in 2023, growing +12% vs 2022, being one of the most important growth engine of the Group.

Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain).

The team is composed of over 170 professionals across Europe. They help listed companies make the most effective use of capital markets, and support private and public organisations run more efficiently.

Euronext Corporate Services already serves more than 4,500+ clients including over 1000 listed companies, private companies, advisors and public organisations. Clients are located across all Euronext markets (Belgium, France, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway Portugal,) but also beyond (e.g. UK, Germany, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Spain).

This unique and comprehensive value proposition is articulated around three main pillars:

* Governance services: To public and private organizations we provide our board portal solution "iBabs" to help secure, organize and run board meetings more efficiently (save time preparing agendas and board packs, collaborate easily with annotations, voting, meeting summaries).Our advanced video technology allows you to easily broadcast your meetings, from webinars, townhalls and studio events, we provide the right solution

* Investor relations and communication services: we help our clients to increase their visibility, engagement and international coverage with shareholders, investors and all stakeholders with leading digital communications and streaming solutions. We also provide flexible and customized market data components for Investor Relations websites of listed companies. Our IR.Manager tool provides a complete and intuitive IR management and targeting platform for corporate IR teams to professionalize the workflow and engagement. Our advisory team provides high-touch advisory, ESG advisory, market intelligence and decision making analytics for listed companies willing to be more active on capital markets.

* Compliance services : our ComplyLog products helps companies simplify their EU regulatory duties, speed up workflows and ensure compliance by automating the management of inside information and insider lists for both issuers and their professional advisors ensuring compliance with the European Market Abuse Regulation (MAR).

Euronext Corporate Services is a fully integrated division of Euronext, including all the resources to pursue its business activities: Revenue, Growth Marketing, Product, Technology & Operations, Client Services and Transformation. It also relies on Euronext support functions to accompany its growth.

Role and Key Accountabilities

Creating proofs of concept (POC) and working on innovative R&D projects.
Design, develop, and deploy AI/ML solutions with a focus on NLP, LLM, audio, and video processing using AI frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Fine-tune and optimize pre-trained models for specific use cases and applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Tech Leads, software engineer(s) and product managers to understand business requirements and translate them into high-quality AI solutions.
Conduct regular performance evaluations, identify bottlenecks, and implement optimization strategies to enhance model efficiency and accuracy.
Conduct experiments and research to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML.
Analyze and interpret complex data sets to derive actionable insights.
Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for models and algorithms.
Build and maintain production ready ML pipelines

Knowledge, Personality, Skills and Experience Required

Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum 3 years of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning.
In-depth knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and generative AI techniques.
Knowledge and experience of development and implementing Generative AI models
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch or Keras.
Experience with natural language processing (NLP) techniques and tools, such as SpaCy, NLTK, or Hugging Face.
Strong understanding of frameworks such as BERT, GPT, or Transformer models.
Hands-on experience in fine-tuning and optimising pre-trained models.
Familiar with cloud-based platforms and services, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Knowledge of trusted AI practices, ensuring fairness, transparency, and accountability in AI models and systems.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at various levels, Fluency in English.
Track record of driving innovation and staying updated with the latest AI research and advancements.

Euronext Values

Unity

We respect and value the people we work with
We are unified through a common purpose
We embrace diversity and strive for inclusion

Integrity

We value transparency, communicate honestly and share information openly
We act with integrity in everything we do
We don't hide our mistakes, and we learn from them

Agility

We act with a sense of urgency and decisiveness
We are adaptable, responsive and embrace change
We take smart risks

Energy

We are positively driven to make a difference and challenge the status quo
We focus on and encourage personal leadership
We motivate each other with our ambition

Accountability

We deliver maximum value to our customers and stakeholders
We take ownership and are accountable for the outcome
We reward and celebrate performance

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. We value the unique talents of all our people, who come from diverse backgrounds with different personal experiences and points of view and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect.


We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, age, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or any other legally protected factor. We value the unique talents of all our people, who come from diverse backgrounds with different personal experiences and points of view and we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect.

Title: Software Engineer for AI Training Data (Python)
Description:
Accepted Locations

We are accepting applicants from the US, Canada, and most countries in LATAM and Europe. We are accepting some countries in Africa and Asia. For the full list of accepted locations, click here. This work is 100% remote.

Loom Video

Our Founder/CEO, Gabe Greenberg, created a more in depth Loom video that we highly recommend you watch! Check it out here: https://www.loom.com/share/5a8972c7fbbf46aaa3f389b2b6391c40

Job Overview

We are currently seeking Developers for project-specific roles focused on RLHF. This role will play a key part in our reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) initiatives, contributing to cutting-edge projects.

You‚Äôll join an expert annotation team to create training data for for the worlds most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the biggest players in the AI/LLM space today. We are seeking software engineers with 4+ years of experience to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!

What Will I Be Doing?


Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively
We asked the technical project manager to go into even more detail and this is how he answered: It is solving coding challenges, creating instructions to help others, reviewing the code before it goes into the model, and there's a ton of variety in the projects. We have everything from "which piece of Python code is better?" to "make a full mobile application using this chatbot, and improve the chatbot's responses afterwards to make it faster"


Contract Length


This project is expected to last until the end of September and you'll be able to continue to work on other projects (though likely not in Swift).
You can end the contract at any time.


Flexible Schedules


Developers can set their own hours - ideal candidates will be interested in spending 15+ hours a week. They will be with teams, so strong performers will adapt to the urgency of projects and stay engaged, but incredibly flexible on working hours.
Take a 3 hour lunch, no problem. You are paid according to time spent on the platform, which is calculated in the coding exercises, as opposed to tracking your own hours.


Compensation


US: $50 /hr
Brazil: $28.70/hr
Egypt: $22.05/hr
Phillipines: $25.55/hr
All other countries: $35/hr
Expectations are 15+ hours per week however there is no upper limit. We have engineers working 20-40 hrs per week and some that are working 40+ hours per week. You can work as much as you want to. You'll get paid on a weekly basis. You get paid per hour of work done on the platform.


Interview Process

We've created a 3.5 hour screening and onboarding process to join as a Software Engineer for AI Training Data which can be accomplished in 1 week or less. We purposely perform most of these steps asynchronously because most of the RLHF work is async and self guided. After you apply, if you look like a good fit we'll provide you access to the G2i dashboard to go through this simple screening process.

Step 1: Learn in depth about the role (35 min)

Step 2: Perform a simple RLHF code review (35 min)

Step 3: Receive platform credentials, pass ID verification (5 min), and choose your project (30 min).

Step 4: Perform a production level RLHF task (75 min) "aka the final interview"

Join us: Based on your final interview, you'll will put you on the right difficulty RLHF project

Title: AI Software Engineer (to help developing new AI tools)
Description:
üöÄ Welcome to Next Engineering - Where Innovation Meets Purpose

Be the NEX T AI Software Engineer!

Context

Ensure the quality of the end-to-end lifecycle of our AI solutions. This includes everything from data preparation and model training to ‚Äì POC and at scale ‚Äì deployment, monitoring, and maintenance. This is in close collaboration with our AI Tech Lead and other team members, helping team to build and deliver AI-powered applications in a secure, efficient, and reliable manner. Such applications are designed to serve several use cases across distinct business areas

Delivery of an AI Tools to support business use cases that will be prioritized by the AI team, whether POCs or production grade.

Mission

Advise and guide the team in designing modern and modular software architectures and frameworks for AI-powered and mostly web-based applications.

Take the lead on establishing best practices for software engineering and adopting the most suitable frameworks, tools and platforms for building successful AI applications.

Develop AI-powered software applications, which might include multiple components such as frontend, backend, databases, API integrations and monitoring.

Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists and software engineers to ensure seamless integration of data pipelines, machine learning algorithms and software modules into successful AI-based applications.

Skills

Data Engineering

Machine-Learning

Artificial Intelligence

Software Architecture and Framework

Knowledge on Financial concepts is a plus (derivatives, stocks, trading, equities...)

Your NEX T step is right here!

Share your CV to with REF NGO

Let's shape the future, together!

Title: MLOps Engineer
Description:
# Think Data Be Smart #




About Us: DataSmart is a Portuguese company, positioning itself as a consulting company of excellence, with over 20 years of existence. We are specialized in Technologies and Information Systems services, for the Portuguese and International markets. We pride ourselves on fostering a culture of involvement, experience, and excellence.




Join our team as an MLOps Engineer (Hybrid - Porto based)!




What You'll Do:

Design, implement, and maintain scalable and reliable machine learning infrastructure.
Develop and automate machine learning workflows, including data ingestion, model training, evaluation, and deployment.
Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
Ensure the performance, scalability, and reliability of machine learning models in production.
Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting systems to detect and address issues in machine learning pipelines.
Optimize and tune machine learning models and infrastructure for cost and performance efficiency.
Stay current with industry trends and best practices in machine learning operations (MLOps).
Assist in troubleshooting and resolving issues in production environments.




Qualifications:

# Think Data Be Smart #


About Us: DataSmart is a Portuguese company, positioning itself as a consulting company of excellence, with over 20 years of existence. We pride ourselves on fostering a culture of involvement, experience, and excellence.

What You'll Do:

Title: Python Developer
Description:
At HAYS, we are collaborating with a multinational based in Portugal which has a team of nearly 300 people based in Portugal, the US, Germany, Brazil, Mexico, Chile, and China who are transforming the business of retailers across the globe.




Currently, we are looking for an Python Developer who meets the following requirements:




Responsabilities:

Analyze and understand specifications/needs and provide insights that assist in identifying potential impacts.
Translate defined architecture into technical solutions.
Solve complex problems by applying analytical and problem-solving skills.
Develop robust and scalable backend systems using Python.
Conduct code reviews and optimizations to enhance the overall performance of the application.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code according to coding standards.
Conduct unit testing and participate in integration testing to ensure reliability across the entire application stack.
Work independently and collaboratively within a cross-functional team environment.




Requirements:

Expertise in Python development.
Proficiency in SQL and relational and non-relational databases (Mongo DB).
Familiarity with backend technologies and API development.
Proven track record of troubleshooting and debugging skills.
Degrees in IT, Computer Science, Telecommunications, Computer Engineering or proven work experience.
5 years of experience.
Proficiency in English.




What we offer:

Permanent contract with us (multinational company).
Hybrid work mode (3 days per week at the office).
Flexible time schedule.




We are eagerly awaiting profiles like yours, passionate about technology and ready to take on new challenges. If this describes you, submit your CV for the position, and we‚Äôll provide you with more details!

Title: R&D GenAI/ML Engineer
Description:
Job Description And Requirements

Seeking a highly motivated and innovative R&D GenAI/ML Engineer. The candidate would be working as part of a highly experienced ASIC mixed-signal design and verification team, targeting the current and next generation USB/PCIe/DPHY/CDPHY/MPHY/DP/HDMI products, applying AI and machine learning models and algorithms to address complex business needs.

The position offers an excellent opportunity to work with a skilled team of digital and mixed signal engineers delivering high-end mixed-signal designs from specification development to performing functional and performance tests on the test-chips.

Development Opportunities


Be brave in the presence of the unknown
Develop systematic ways to address new problems, think outside of the box
Produce high quality work and products
Write patents for any inventions


Main Duties Might Include


AI/ML Solution Development: Design, develop, and deploy AI and machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex business problems.
Technical Leadership: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior engineers and data scientists, guiding them in best practices and advanced techniques.
Research & Innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies and apply them to improve existing systems or develop new solutions.
Collaboration: Work closely with R&D engineers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements, create technical specifications, and ensure successful implementation of AI solutions.
Data Analysis & Preprocessing: Perform data analysis, data preprocessing, and feature engineering to prepare datasets for machine learning models.
Model Training & Evaluation: Train, validate, and fine-tune machine learning models, ensuring they meet performance and accuracy requirements.
Deployment & Monitoring: Deploy AI models into production environments, and monitor their performance, making adjustments as necessary to maintain optimal operation.
Documentation: Document AI models, algorithms, and methodologies to ensure reproducibility and knowledge sharing within the team.
Compliance & Ethics: Ensure AI solutions adhere to ethical guidelines, data privacy regulations, and industry standards


Key Qualifications


Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
Strong understanding and expertise in ML/AI.
3+ years of hands-on experience in AI and ML solutions
Knowledge of semiconductor manufacturing process is a plus.
Scripting and programming skills: Unix Shell, Python, C++, Perl, TCL is a plus
Strong understanding of statistical analysis, data mining, and data visualization techniques.
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum)
Strong desire to learn and explore new technologies.
English language working proficiency and communication skills allowing teamwork in an international environment.
Willingness to work in a distributed international team.


About Synopsys

At Synopsys, we‚Äôre at the heart of the innovations that change the way we work and play. Self-driving cars. Artificial Intelligence. The cloud. 5G. The Internet of Things. These breakthroughs are ushering in the Era of Smart Everything. And we‚Äôre powering it all with the world‚Äôs most advanced technologies for chip design and software security. If you share our passion for innovation, we want to meet you.

Our silicon IP business is all about integrating more capabilities into a system on chip ‚Äî faster. We offer the world‚Äôs broadest portfolio of silicon IP ‚Äî memories, data interfaces, security, and processors. Our products help our customers meet performance, power and size requirements of their applications. This allows differentiated products to reach the market quickly with reduced risk. Synopsys fosters an environment that treats people with respect, honesty, and professionalism. We‚Äôre committed to partnering with the communities in which we work. Every year, Synopsys reaches out to local communities with resources to support education, science programs and other activities. Come and you can be part of a team that innovates and shapes the way the world moves on.

Stay Connected: Join our Talent Community

Inclusion and Diversity are important to us. Synopsys considers all applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, military veteran status, or disability.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
HTML:
Make an impact by working for sectors where technology is the enabler, everything is ground-breaking and there‚Äôs a constant need to be innovative.

Be part of the team that combines business knowledge, technological edge and a design experience. Our different backgrounds and know-how are key in developing solutions and experiences for digital clients.

Face challenges and learn other ways of thinking and seeing the world - there‚Äôs always room for your energy and creativity.

About The Role

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for collaborating closely with pre-sales teams for cross-functional end-client solutions and for designing solutions in ongoing projects. You can also participate in projects as a specialist, ensuring proper solution delivery, monitoring, and governance using MLOps.

As a part of your job, you will:

  • Participate in pre-sales activities related to the Data Science field.
  • Leverage data and domain knowledge to solve business problems and create quantifiable value.
  • Work cross-functionally to define problem statements, define requirements, and design suitable solutions;
  • Lead/Support the development of data-driven optimization models, experiments, forecasting algorithms, and capacity constraint models;
  • Lead teams into delivering models using best MLOps practices;
  • Communicate final recommendations and support decision-making.


What are we looking for?

  • Degree in an analytical field (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research, Management Science);
  • Scripting with one of these languages (e.g., Python, Pyspark, Spark-mllib);
  • Experienced with packages such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Dplyr, and Ggplot2;
  • Project experience as a Data Scientist or in a role closely related to data (e.g., Analytics);
  • Experience working with and leading teams in a project environment;
  • Experience in Telco Industry;
  • Experience in delivering projects using MLOps best practices;
  • Experience in distribution-based architectures such as Cloudera, AWS, Microsoft Azure Cloud, and GCP (Google Cloud Platform), among others.


Personal traits:

Ability to adapt to different contexts, teams and Clients

Teamwork skills but also sense of autonomy

Motivation for international projects and ok if travel is included

Willingness to collaborate with other players

Strong communication skills

We want people who like to roll up their sleeves and open their minds. Believe this is you? Come join the Team!

Celfocus is a European high-tech system integrator, providing professional services focused on creating business value through Analytics and Cognitive solutions ‚Äì addressing Telecommunications, Energy & Utilities, Financial Services and other markets' strategic opportunities.

Serving Clients in 25+ countries, Celfocus delivers solutions such as accelerating digital network transformation in Autonomous Networks, elevating and monetising business services in B2B2x ecosystems, and providing highly relevant customer experiences through Hyper-personalisation solutions.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Who We Are:

At VML, we are a beacon of innovation and growth in an ever-evolving world. Our heritage is built upon a century of combined expertise, where creativity meets technology, and diverse perspectives ignite inspiration. With the merger of VMLY&R and Wunderman Thompson, we have forged a new path as a growth partner that is part creative agency, part consultancy, and part technology powerhouse.

Our global family now encompasses over 30,000 employees across 150+ offices in 64 markets, each contributing to a culture that values connection, belonging, and the power of differences. Our expertise spans the entire customer journey, offering deep insights in communications, commerce, consultancy, CRM, CX, data, production, and technology. We deliver end-to-end solutions that result in revolutionary work.




The opportunity:

Python Developer needed to join our team here at VML Enterprise Solutions.




What you‚Äôll be doing:

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Python Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a background in web development using Python and related frameworks. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications that meet the needs of our clients. You will join a collaborative team with a focus on engineering best practice and continuous improvement and will have lots of business exposure, enabling you to see the results of your work. You will have excellent knowledge of the DevOps process and can work with large and complex codebases to ensure our product is leading edge.




What we want from you:

Python development experience with a focus on web applications/services
Strong knowledge of Python 3.x and either FastAPI/Flask framework
Hands-on experience with RDBMS (Postgres, Oracle or others) and ORM
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices and industry standards
Experience developing API microservices
Significant experience of working with Agile methodologies
Good problem-solving skills




If you know some of this, even better:

GCP or any other Cloud experience
Kubernetes experience




What we can offer you:

Alongside the opportunity to work with some of the most exciting brands around the world, we‚Äôll also prioritise your career development and help you grow your skills. We‚Äôll empower you to make a difference, allow you to be yourself, and respect who you are.




Our personality and behaviours: We believe that we are what we do, not just what we say. Our shared values and behaviours show how to bring the VML Enterprise Solution's culture to life through the actions we all take every day:

Connect Meaningfully
Inspire Creatively
Include Purposefully
Approach Positively




Our brilliant, talented people are what makes VML Enterprise Solutions what we are. That‚Äôs why we look for people who go beyond and always push our thinking to be better than yesterday.




AT VML Enterprise Solutions

Our Enterprise Solutions division houses strategic consultants, creative and technical architects and skilled developers and operators that together help some of the world‚Äôs leading organisations to deliver outstanding digital experiences across all major routes to market worldwide: marketplaces, online retailers, D2C, B2B and social platforms. With over 4,200 experts in 55 operational centres across 34 countries, our capabilities span the entire buying journey from customer acquisition, through engagement, to conversion and loyalty, driving multi-channel growth for world-leading brands.




We work with some of the most exciting brands such as The Coca-Cola Company, EY, Bosch, Unilever, Ford, DFS, Mercedes-Benz, Johnson & Johnson, Nestl√©, Sainsbury‚Äôs, Selfridges, Shell and Tiffany & Co. We‚Äôve built over 500 platforms for brands and retailers and generate in excess of $29bn annually for our clients and work with over 50 strategic partners including Adobe, SAP, Salesforce, HCL, Shopify, Sitecore, BigCommerce, commerce tools and Acquia. Our reputation is based on our people, and we believe we have some of the best in the business.

As our business grows internationally, we‚Äôre looking for new people to join us on our journey to inspire and take a key role in shaping some of the best commerce solutions, services, and websites in the world. Working as a team, no problem is insurmountable; we share in our client‚Äôs successes and believe that anyone can show creative bravery no matter what their role is in the team.




In our Lisbon or Porto office, you‚Äôll join a team of other specialists who are always ready to help each other. The team is part of our Enterprise Solutions network and works in coordination with our Local and EMEA client leads.




At VML, we are committed to fostering an all-inclusive work environment that is both rewarding and career-forward. Our Inclusion, Equity & Belonging initiatives, alongside the VML Foundation, reflect our dedication to giving back and making a positive impact in our communities and beyond. Our people are the heartbeat of our organization‚Äîcreators, doers, innovators, makers, and thinkers‚Äîwho drive not just marketing, but meaningful experiences that resonate in every action and interaction.




VML is a WPP Agency. For more information, please visit our website, and follow VML on our social channels via Instagram, LinkedIn, and X.




When you click "Submit Application", this will send any information you add below to VML. Before you do this, we think it's a good idea to read through our Recruitment Privacy Policy. California residents should read our California Recruitment Privacy Notice. This explains what we do with your personal data when you apply for a role with us, and, how you can update the information you have provided us with or how to remove it.

Title: Fullstack Developer (Python+React)
Description:
Position: Fullstack Developer (Python+React)

Location: Porto, Portugal

Work regime: remote

PTC Group is recruiting for a company that provides services in the areas of Technological Consulting, Strategic Consulting and Engineering, focused on creating solutions tailored to the needs of each client.

Key Responsibilities:


Lead the development and implementation of the UI component for the Enterprise Data Platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of the UI with backend services.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a collaborative and innovative development environment.
Contribute to the overall architecture and design of the platform.



Required Skills:


Proficient in JavaScript development, particularly with React.
Experience with Git/GitHub for source control management (SCM).
Familiarity with DevOps for Application Lifecycle Management (ALM).
Bash scripting for build processes.
Expertise in Terraform for deployment, including writing custom scripts.
Knowledge of Docker for development and testing environments.
Experience with Jenkins for deployment automation.
Familiarity with Nexus for artifact storage.
Proficient in AWS JavaScript SDK and Python development.
Experience with AWS services and environments.



Preferred Qualifications:


Experience leading or managing a development team.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Previous experience in developing enterprise-level platforms or applications.

Title: RnD Compound Developer
Description:
Company Description

Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobility of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent and affordable solutions for vehicles, machines, traffic and transportation. In 2022, Continental generated sales of ‚Ç¨39.4 billion and currently employs around 200,000 people in 57 countries and markets.

With its premium portfolio in the car, truck, bus, two-wheel and speciality tire segment, the Tires group sector stands for innovative solutions in tire technology. Intelligent products and services related to tires and the promotion of sustainability complete the product portfolio. For specialist dealers and fleet management, Tires offers digital tire monitoring and tire management systems, in addition to other services, with the aim of keeping fleets mobile and increasing their efficiency. With its tires, Continental makes a significant contribution to safe, efficient and environmentally friendly mobility.

Job Description

In your role as RnD Compound Developer you are responsible for the development of innovative rubber compounds according to customer requirements via our internal gateway processes. You demonstrate and ensure the performance capability of newly developed compound concepts in the initial industrialization phase (Pilot). You develop and maintain know-how regarding the transfer of tire performance to compound properties. You will also be leading compound development projects and participate as a team member in other RnD projects as required. You are involved in the pro-active integration of sustainable materials in the development process. To ensure our competitiveness you perform patent and literature screenings and right to use evaluations on a regular basis.

Qualifications


Academic degree in chemistry, chemical engineering or comparable fields
Minimum 3 years of experience in the Automotive Sector
Working experience in material development or related fields desirable
Project management skills (preferable)
Strong customer and quality orientation
Self-organization and ability to work with autonomy;
Good communication and interaction skills
Proactive problem-solving mind-set and willingness to learn
Capability to lead cross functional teams
Intercultural competency along with clear and open communication abilities that support the growth of diversity
Solid computer skills and Office tools;
English language skills (written and spoken);
Availability for travelling.


Additional Information


Integration in a challenging and international work environment, featured by the existence of state-of-the-art technologies;
Local employment contract with attractive remuneration package and benefits
Continuous professional training and excellent possibilities of personal and professional development.


Ready to drive with Continental? Take the first step and fill in the online application.

HTML:

Title: Backend Software Engineer (Python)
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, and more freedom. Since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. Our powerhouse of products ‚Äî including spending, saving, investing, exchanging, travelling, and more ‚Äî help our 45+ million customers get more from their money every day.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,‚Äå 2 things are essential to our success: our people and our culture. In recognition of our outstanding employee experience, we've been certified as a Great Place to Work‚Ñ¢. So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our offices and remotely, to help us achieve our mission. And we're looking for more brilliant people. People who love building great products, redefining success, and turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt just one of the best in the industry. It's one of the best in the world. And we‚Äôre proud of it. It‚Äôs our driving force ‚Äî our engine üöÄ

From building a new financial backend to creating an award-winning app, there‚Äôs nothing (and we mean nothing) our tech team can‚Äôt do.

Our Technology team isn‚Äôt here to fix legacy systems ‚Äî it‚Äôs here to build world-class financial products from the ground up. Products that'll be used by millions of people around the world üåé

You may expect our Python Engineers to work on heavily regulated financial systems, but we love the unexpected. We‚Äôre better known internally for writing high-quality code and building complex novel solutions end-to-end.

These geniuses have created our chatbot ‚Äî the lovely Rita ‚Äî and they didn‚Äôt stop there. They‚Äôve also created automated FinCrime quality controls in a few weeks. Yes, they‚Äôre just that good!

You‚Äôll never work alone, either. As a Python Engineer, you‚Äôll sit within a Product Team simultaneously working with Data Scientists, Analysts, Engineers, Product Owners, and Operations Managers to solve problems and make our rocket ship fly even higher.

Watch this video to discover how our Engineering department is structured and what we expect from our brilliant engineers. If you‚Äôre up for the challenge of shaping the future of finance, let‚Äôs get in touch.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing


Building APIs, making sure they're properly designed and scaled according to business needs
Creating data pipelines to pull data from production services into our data warehouse, powering reporting, data analytics, and data science
Writing event consumers to build new data models to provide this data to new flows and processes


What You'll Need


5+ years of experience working as a Software Engineer
3+ years engineering with Python as your primary language
An academic background in a STEM subject
Fluency in Python, SQL, and other OOPLs
Experience with API development and integration
A practical understanding of distributed systems
The ability to write concurrent code in IO/CPU bound situations
Experience with Docker, K8s, Ansible, Teamcity, monitoring, and alerting


Nice to have


Experience with prototyping and sketching
Multiple side projects or open source contributions
Exposure to GCP
Experience with Django Framework


Building a global financial super app isn‚Äôt enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that‚Äôs why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We‚Äôre doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That‚Äôs why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.
